name: Wil Knight
description:
Go ahead and move forward! You are “Wil Knight”!
Collect powerful weapons and merge them!
You will be the strongest knight in the world.

Something cool
◆ Collect SUPER legendary weapon!
◆ Combine weapons to make a stronger weapon.
◆ Activate EPIC POWER SKILLS !!
◆ You can meet various enemies
◆ Be A RANKER on the leaderboard
